full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYES BU GSUM GYI LAM GYI RIM, ,GSAL BAR BYED PA DPE YI CHOS, ,RIN CHEN SPUNGS PA MAN NGAG MCHOG ,PU TO BSKOR BA'I KHYAD CHOS BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @409A *, ,PO TO SKOR BA'I KHYAD CHOS DON GSAL BYED PA'I SGRON ME, DPE CHOS RIN PO CHE SPUNGS PA'I 'BUM 'GREL, BTZUN PA SHES RAB RDO RJES BKOD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DGE'O,, CIG ZHUS DAG GO, MANGGA LAm,, ,, @409B AOm SVA STI, 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS MCHOG NGUR SMRIG ZLOS GAR GYIS, ,SLAR YANG THUB BSTAN GSAL MDZAD RIN CHEN GSAL, ,THUGS SRAS DAM PA DRAB PA BRAG DKAR SOGS, ,YAB SRAS BRGYAD PAR BCAS LA GUS PHYAG 'TSAL, ,MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS RNAMS KYI SNYING PO DON, ,JO BO YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI THUGS DAM MTHIL, ,LAM RIM GSAL STON DPE CHOS RIN CHEN SPUNGS, ,RTZA 'GREL MAN NGAG NGO MTSAR DAM PA 'DI, ,PHYOGS DUS KUN TU 'PHEL BAR BYA BA DANG, ,LAM BZANG 'DI LA BAG CHAGS 'JOG PA'I PHYIR, ,DAD LDAN CHOS RJE DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN GYA NOM SBYAR NAS PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE BA 'DI YIS PHAN BDE'I RTZA LAG MCHOG , RGYAL BSTAN 'PHEL ZHING BLA MA'I ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,BDAG GZHAN 'GRO KUN JO BO YAB SRAS KYI, ,DGONGS PA MTHAR @410A *, ,PHYIN KUN MKHYEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,KHYAD PAR CHOS 'DIR 'BREL THOGS SKYE BO KUN, ,GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG 'DOD DON KUN 'GRUB CING, ,TSE RABS KUN TU LAM MCHOG 'DI NYID LA, ,SPYOD PA'I SKAL BZANG MNGON DU 'GYUR BAR SHOG , LAM MCHOG SGRUB LA THOGS MED MTHU LDAN PA'I, ,YI DAM SRUNG MAS RTAG TU RJES BZUNG NAS, ,BAR CHAD ZHI ZHING MTHUN RKYEN LEGS TSOGS KUN, ,YAR NGO'I ZLA BZHIN 'PHEL BA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,(CES HAL HA SANG NO YANG NI SDER GTOGS RDZA SAG AER TE NI TSE RING RDO RJE'I SHOG , BSTAN 'GRO LA LHAG BSAM CAN GYI CHOS RJE DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DAD PAS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE DNGOS PO'I MTHUN RKYEN GYA NOM PA SPYAR NAS RANG GI DGON PAR DPE CHOS RIN CHEN SPUNGS PA'I GLEGS BAM PAR DU BZHENGS PA'I TSE PAR BYANG SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, ,BTZUN GZUGS LHUN GRUB BDE BAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI BYA BA 'BAR GNAS MCHOG PHUN TSOGS CHOS LDING GLING DU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,)
